程序包 SCRAME_grp1

类 Validation

  • java.lang.Object
    • SCRAME_grp1.Validation
  • public class Validation
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller class in charge of validating user input and verifying logical relationships among different class

    • 方法详细资料

      • studentExists

        public static boolean studentExists​(java.lang.String matricNumber,
                                    DataContainer container)
        A method that checks the existence of student record from DataContainer
        参数:
        matricNumber - The matriculation number of student to be checked
        container - A datacontainer that contains the student and the course
        返回:
        Return true if the student with the matriculation number is existed in the DataContainer, else it returns false

      • checkCourseExisted

        public static boolean checkCourseExisted​(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                         DataContainer container)
        A method that checks the existence of course record from DataContainer
        参数:
        courseCode - The course title of the course which the user wish to inquire
        container - A datacontainer that contains the student and the course
        返回:
        Return true if the course with the course code is existed in the DataContainer, else it returns false

      • checkStudentResultsRecord

        public static int checkStudentResultsRecord​(Student student,
                                            java.lang.String coursetitle)
        A methods that checks the student results record of course titles
        参数:
        student - The student which the user wish to inquire
        coursetitle - The course which the user wish to inquire
        返回:
        Returns the list of student with the course code

      • checkWhetherStudentRegisteredForACourse

        public static java.lang.Boolean checkWhetherStudentRegisteredForACourse​(Student student,
                                                                        java.lang.String coursetitle)
        A method that checks whether student registered for course
        参数:
        student - The student which the user wish to inquire
        coursetitle - The course which the user wish to inquire
        返回:
        Returns true if the student has registered for the course that matches the course title

      • checkWhetherHasAssessmentWeightage

        public static java.lang.Boolean checkWhetherHasAssessmentWeightage​(Course course)
        A Boolean method that check whether a course has assessment weightage assigned
        参数:
        course - The course which the user wish to inquire
        返回:
        Returns false if the assessment weightage is not assigned to the course with the course code, else it will return true

      • validateNumberInput

        public static boolean validateNumberInput​(java.lang.String str)
        A Boolean method that check whether the format of user input is valid
        参数:
        str - The input string from the user
        返回:
        Returns true if the input is a valid integer, else it will raise NumberFormatException by returning false

      • validateFloatInput

        public static boolean validateFloatInput​(java.lang.String str)
        A Boolean method that check whether the format of user input is valid
        参数:
        str - The input string from the user
        返回:
        Returns true if the input is a valid float, else it will raise NumberFormatException by returning false

      • validateWeightageSum

        public static boolean validateWeightageSum​(float f)
        A Boolean method that check whether the sum of the component weightage is valid
        参数:
        f - the sum of the floating number from user input
        返回:
        Returns true if the sum of the floating number from user input is 1, else it returns false

      • validateNameInput

        public static boolean validateNameInput​(java.lang.String str)
        A Boolean method that check whether the name input string from the user is valid
        参数:
        str - The input string from the user
        返回:
        Returns true if the input string is in the range of alphabetical A to Z, either in uppercases or lowercases, or both

      • validateGroupNameInput

        public static boolean validateGroupNameInput​(java.lang.String str)
        A Boolean method that check whether the group name input string from the user is valid
        参数:
        str - The input string from the user
        返回:
        Returns true if the input string is in the range of alphabetical A to Z, either in uppercases or lowercases, or both, or in the range from 0 to 9
